name: mw7
description:
1:1
2021.
4950x4950 px  

I’m trying to achieve a balance. 

Angles and geometric forms are connected to fluid curves. They contrast and also compliment each other. 

I don’t want one to outweigh the other.

The same applies to the colours I’ve used. 

These and those to achieve a kind of equilibrium. 

To me, it’s a fucking symphony.
